title: Rs 18 crore per km to Rs 250 crore per km, CAG flags ‘very high’ project cost of Dwarka Expressway
comments:
Ban to gaya na (English: atleast it's completed) is what the dilliwalas want to say.

Plus, it's built by a legacy brand that operated since ages.
